sentences.en: "Know" is an answer of affirmation, nonentity the slightest problem.
sentences.cn: “知道”是一个肯定的答案，不存在丝毫问题。

sentences.en: Amidst the current bunch of nonentities, he is a towering figure.
sentences.cn: 在目前这帮无足轻重的人里面，他算是鹤立鸡群了。

sentences.en: How could such a nonentity become chairman of the company?
sentences.cn: 这样的庸才怎么能当公司的董事长?

sentences.en: She was written off then as a political nonentity.
sentences.cn: 她当时被认定是成不了气候的政坛小人物。

sentences.en: There was Walther Funk , the shifty - eyed nonentity who had succeeded Schacht.
sentences.cn: 在被告席上还有沙赫特的继任者,目光躲闪、无足轻重的人物瓦尔特-丰克.

words.tran_cn: 不存在；虚无；无足轻重的人

trans.tran_en: someone who has no importance or power and who is not special in any way
